# Quick Install

You will only need to add the following to your HTML file:
```bash
<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/CaydenDev/monoplex@main/monoplex.css">
```

Example:
```html
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/CaydenDev/monoplex@main/monoplex.css">
</head>
</html>
```

(More Coming Soon!)
